name: Tinkerat
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2020 (48 hour)

Theme: Repair

Play as a mouse that needs to repair a Top and test it out! Use the mouse to perform specific tinkering actions, and then control the Top to avoid obstacles! Try to keep the top spinning for the longest amount of time possible!

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/tinkerat-1
